title: Best of The Herd for Apr 01, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Apr 01, 2020
description:
The NFL Draft will be great for us as sports fans despite what twitter says

The Bengals should but can't trade the #1 pick

Belichick told you 29 years ago why he doesn't want Cam Newton

Guest: Bill Simmons, The Ringer
